title.narrative: National Trade Corridor Highway Investment Program - Tranche 3

description.narrative: The Project 3 (E35: Hasanabdal-Havellian Expressway Package-3) is part of the National Trade Corridor and the Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation (CAREC) Corridor 5. E-35 connects the existing Islamabad - Peshawar Motorway M1 near Hasanabadal to Havelian near Abbotabad.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: improved regional network for the movement of goods and people along E35 expressway.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Freight vehicle operating cost along Sarai Saleh-Havelian section of E35 reduced to PRs145/km (baseline: PRs191/km in 2013)

description.narrative: improved regional network for the movement of goods and people along E35 expressway.

title.narrative: Passenger vehicle operating cost along Sarai Saleh-Havelian section of E35 reduced to PRs15.7/km (baseline: PRs 21.5/km in 2013)

description.narrative: improved regional network for the movement of goods and people along E35 expressway.

title.narrative: Average travel speed along Sarai Saleh-Havelian section of E35 expressway increased to 85 kph (baseline: 55 kph in 2013)
